item.title: Publish on Chrome Web Store

item.title: Build release assets
item.description: build-assets-on-release workflow Let’s create the first workflow that utilizes build-test-pack action and builds release assets for offline distribution once a release has been published. .github/workflows/build-assets-on-release.yml: name: Build release assets on: release: # Creating draft releases will not trigger it types: [published] jobs: # We will add 3 jobs here... The workflow will have 3 jobs: ensure-zip: Ensuring we have zip release asset. build-signed-crx-asset: Building crx asset. build-signed-xpi-asset: Building xpi asset. ensure-zip job The first job will find zip asset in the release or build it if not found:
